OANH HUYNH
MARKETING MANAGER
resume
OCCUPATION GOALS
Working in fascinating environments
Developing professional, dynamic & 
consistent capabilities
Gaining higher skills and experience from 
superiors and colleagues
EDUCATION
PROFESSIONAL PR
����
BMG INTERNATIONAL EDUCATION
• General PR and 
specifc types of PR
• Relationship 
management
• Marketing professional 
applications
• PR skills
in planning
• Writing PR Article
• Organizing Events
• Crisis management skills
BACHELOR OF RELATIONS
����
HO CHI MINH UNIVERSITY OF FOREIGN LANGUAGES AND TECHNOLOGY
• PR, Event
• Public Speaking Skill
• Translate
• Pro – Communication Skill
• Presentation Skill
• Customer Service
• Persuasion Skill
• Marketing
The Best PR Graduation Essay Award for “Tra Viet – Say Me Niem Tu Hao”
by HUFLIT University.
QUALIFICATIONS
Outstanding in communication, 
presentation, and sales skills
Strong in personnel interviewing, 
training, and motivating skill in 
organization and offce procedures
Ability to achieve immediate and 
long‐term goals as well as to meet 
operational deadlines
EXPERIENCE
����������
MARKETING MANAGER
NGUYEN QUANG AUTO: HYUNDAI DEALER, NISSAN DEALER
- Managing and coordinating all marketing & advertising activities.
- Conducting market research to determine market requirements for available and future products.
- Analysing customer research, current market conditions and competitor information.
- Producing Marketing presentations.
- Liaising with media and advertising partners. 
- Managing the productivity of the Marketing plans and projects
- Monitoring, revising and reporting all Marketing activities and outcomes.
- Determining and managing Marketing budget
- Delivering Marketing activities within agreed budget
- Developing, coordinating and supporting all Marketing campaigns and activities of Hyundai Viet Nam.
- Heading Marketing, Marketing Communication, Product Marketing.
- Developing Marketing communication and brand strategy for the company and its regional branches.
- Monitoring coporate designs and updating website, brochures, catalouges and PR materials .
- Organizing Marketing campaigns together with sales and services departments.
- Managing and organizing communication activities of tradeshow, fairs and events.
- Identifying target market and developing effective communication strategies.
- Monthly Marketing Burget reporting.
- Monitoring and managing visual brand of offces and customers’ showrooms. 
- Motivating and leading marketing team.
- Reporting to General Manager.
�����������������������
OPERATION MANAGER
DMC SAIGON ENTERTAINMENT
- Improving the operational systems, processes and policies in support of organizations mission, 
specifcally, supporting better management reporting, information fow and management, business process 
and organizational planning.
- Managing and increasing the effectiveness and effciency of Support Services (HR, IT and Finance) 
through improvements to each function as well as coordination and communication between support and 
business functions.
- Playing a signifcant role in long-term planning, including an initiative geared toward operational excellence.
MS Word
MS Excel
MS Power Point
Networking Communication
Suffcient in both individual and 
team work
Ability to work under pressure; 
enthusiastic, good sense of 
humor and innovative.

EXPERIENCE (CONT.)
- Overseeing overall fnancial management, planning, systems and controls.
- Managing agency budget in coordination with the Executive Director.
- Developing individual program budgets
- Invoicing to funding sources, including calculation of completed units of service.
- Managing payroll including tabulation of accrued employee benefts.
- Disbursing checks for agency expenses.
- Organizing fscal documents.
- Regular meetings with Executive Director around fscal planning.
- Supervising and coaching offce managers on a weekly basis.
���������������������
MARKETING SPECIALIST
PHUC LONG CO., LTD
A. MARKETING SPECIALIST
- Preparing promotion plans for opening ceremony of new stores to attract potential customers 
- Liaising with media partners for copywriter, articles, advertisement. 
- Solving Partners’ requests; considering and proposing co-oporation with partners.
- Proposing promotional campaigns for Valentine‘s Day, International Women’s Day, Mid-Autumn Festival, 
Christmas Holiday, Tet Holiday,… to increase sales
- Supporting store chain‘s holiday decorations.
- Researching potential markets and conducting competitor reviews.
- Coordinating with Design department to produce Outlet menu: price, name of food, beverage.
- Producing POSM contents: standee, leafet, Press Releases, articles published on newspapers and 
product launching.
- Administrating Phuc Long Fanpage (more than 100.000 fan); updating information of company event, 
promotion program, opening ceremony, product launch; managing fanpage contents and interacting with 
fanpage’s users.
- Leading Call Center Project: taking orders from customers via phone; managing call center operators 
and following up delivery’s progress.
- Managing product pricing for store‘s beverage and food.
B. CUSTOMER CARE SPECIALIST
- Taking care of available customers and approaching potential customers from outlet system.
- Conducting customer care plans quarterly.
- Conducting and executing promotion plans for Membership programs.
- Monitoring hotline
- Receiving and handling comments / complaints from hotline and giving feedback on quality as well as 
service of store chains to fulfll customers' need.
C. STORE SUPERVISOR
- Supporting management and monitoring activities of Store System: monitoring staff’ uniform, behavior, 
attitude to customers, ..
- Holding weekly meeting with store managers; handling arising problems and reporting to BoD.
- Supervising store chain‘s daily activities: monthly sales, hygiene, working condition, facilities, beverage 
and food’s quality, service quality, etc.
- Training new recruits.
������������������������
VICE PRESIDENT ASSISTANT
AMERICAN SOLUTION COMPANY
- Preparing daily working plans for Vice President.
- Following up and conducting monthly reports to Vice President.
- Composing contracts & procedures upon company’s required.
- Managing PR and Events.
- Sales Support
- Executing offce administrative tasks.
ACCOUNT MANAGER
������������
VIET DRAGON COMMUNICATION
- Seeking and approaching potential customers
- Meeting with clients, handling clients’ briefs and conducting quotations and contracts.
- Distributing cosmetics for: Parkson, Lan Phuong Company and EDU International School, etc.
- Responsible for media booking, launching or promotion events.
- Conducting PR Proposal
- Copywriting
- Establishing and maintaining relationships with media partners
PUBLIC RELATION SPECIALIST
����
CTC – CORP
- Establishing and maintaining relationships with media partners
- Planing for PR Program of project and seeking sponsors.
- Administrating website and managing regular website content.
- Copywriting
- Supporingt internal communication.
OANH HUYNH
MARKETING MANAGER
�������������������������
OCCUPATION GOALS
Working in fascinating environments
Developing professional, dynamic & 
consistent capabilities
Gaining higher skills and experience from 
superiors and colleagues
QUALIFICATIONS
Outstanding in communication, 
presentation, and sales skills
Strong in personnel interviewing, 
training, and motivating skill in 
organization and offce procedures
Ability to achieve immediate and 
long‐term goals as well as to meet 
operational deadlines
MS Word
MS Excel
MS Power Point
Networking Communication
Suffcient in both individual and 
team work
Ability to work under pressure; 
enthusiastic, good sense of 
humor and innovative.
